name: Maybelline SuperStay lipstick
description: SuperStay 24 Liquid Lipstick. This long wearing liquid lipstick won’t cake, flake, or dry thanks to our proprietary Micro-Flex technology.
author: admin

name: Stila: Stay all Day® Waterproof Liquid Eye Liner
description: Award-winning liquid eyeliner in an amazing, satin finish. Fine marker-like tip offers precise application for everyone from novices to pros.

name: MAC STUDIO FIX CONCEAL AND CORRECT PALETTE
description: A palette with four concealers and two corrector shades to match any skin tone.

name: Revlon Super Lustrous Pearl Lipstick
description: Truly addictive to wear. Revlon Super Lustrous™ Lipstick is an iconic cult classic for a reason. It glides on effortlessly with 80% conditioning ingredients, and minimizes lines for smooth, fuller-looking lips. Creamy, moisturized feel.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Dewy Finish Setting Spray
description: Demand perfection! Makeup lovers and professionals alike know that fresh, glowing, dewy makeup looks that last, must be set with NYX Professional Makeup Dewy Setting Spray.

name: L'Oréal Paris Infallible Pro-Glow Foundation
description: The New Pro-Look of Longwear. It’s Pro With an All-Day Glow. Up to 24HR Foundation. Discover the new pro finish of longwear: up to 24 hour wear with a hydrating glow.

name: NARS Bronzing Cream
description: Bronzer just got better with a decadently creamy formula in five sunkissed shades inspired by bestselling Laguna.

name: BareMinerals: Mineralist Lasting Eyeliner
description: Waterproof eyeliner, vibrant long-lasting color that won't smudge, budge or flake.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Butter Gloss
description: The OG fan-fave butter gloss, now available in clear to bring you glossy perfection with our non-sticky shine the most universal product for anyone, anywhere, anytime.

name: Glo Shadow Quad
description: Create a custom eye statement with four expertly matched shades. Our best Eye Shadow Quads are formulated with skin-benefiting antioxidants and rich mineral pigments. These blendable Eye Shadow Quad colors bring any look to life.
